SELECT p.project_no projectNo , p.project_auth projectAuth , p.project_name projectName , DATE_FORMAT(p.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate , IF(ISNULL(p.project_end), "진행중", "완료") projectEnd , (SELECT round(count(task_end) / count(*) * 100, 1) FROM task_list tl INNER JOIN task t ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no WHERE tl.project_no = projectNo) complete , (SELECT work_member_no FROM project_member WHERE active = 'Y' AND project_member_auth = 'Y' AND project_no = projectNo AND work_member_no = #{workMemberNo}) manager , (SELECT work_member_no FROM project_bookmark WHERE project_no = projectNo AND work_member_no = #{workMemberNo}) projectBookmark FROM project p
INNER JOIN project_member pm ON pm.project_no = p.project_no
INNER JOIN project_group_conn pgc ON pgc.project_no = p.project_no
INNER JOIN project_bookmark pb ON p.project_no = pb.project_no
WHERE work_no = #{workNo} AND (p.project_auth = 'N' OR p.project_no IN ( SELECT p.project_no FROM project p INNER JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no WHERE work_member_no = #{workMemberNo} AND project_auth = 'Y' ) )
AND pm.work_member_no = #{workMemberNo}
AND p.project_keep = 'Y'
AND pgc.projectgroup_no = #{projectGroupNo}
AND pb.work_member_no = #{workMemberNo}
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND p.project_end IS NULL
ORDER BY p.project_no
ORDER BY p.create_date DESC
ORDER BY p.project_name

SELECT p.project_no projectNo , p.project_auth projectAuth , p.project_name projectName , DATE_FORMAT(p.create_date ,'%Y-%m-%d') createDate , p.project_end projectEnd , (SELECT round(count(task_end) / count(*) * 100, 1) FROM task_list tl INNER JOIN task t ON t.tasklist_no = tl.tasklist_no WHERE tl.project_no = projectNo) complete FROM project p WHERE p.project_auth = 'N' AND p.work_no = #{workNo}
ORDER BY p.project_no
ORDER BY p.create_date DESC
ORDER BY p.project_name
SELECT project_no projectNo , project_name projectName FROM project WHERE work_no = #{workNo}

SELECT p.project_no projectNo , p.project_name projectName , q.projectgroup_no projectGroupNo FROM project p LEFT JOIN (SELECT project_no , pg.projectgroup_no , projectgroup_name FROM project_group_conn pgc INNER JOIN project_group pg ON pgc.projectgroup_no = pg.projectgroup_no WHERE pg.projectgroup_no = #{projectGroupNo}) q ON p.project_no = q.project_no WHERE p.work_no = #{workNo}

SELECT project_no projectNo , work_no workNo , project_name projectName , project_expl projectExpl , project_auth projectAuth , project_start projectStart , project_deadline projectDeadline , project_end projectEnd , project_keep projectKeep FROM project WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}
SELECT count(*) projectCnt , round(count(project_end) / count(*) * 100, 1) projectComplete FROM project p WHERE p.work_no = #{workNo}
